casebody.data:
Town of Beech Mountain
v.
Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc. 230A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2016 Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Meagan I. Kiser, Attorney at Law, Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Attorney at Law, Boone, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Beech Mountain. Charles E. Clement, Attorney at Law, Boone, John J. Korzen, Attorney at Law, for Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc.

Charles A. Brady, III, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of June 2016 by Defendant to Strike Issue II from Notice of Appeal Based on Dissent in Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of July 2016."
